--- Pacifix / Crossroads ---

Pacifix continues, "There are things to be done now, and those 
things need to be done quickly and efficiently." He pauses as 
Artemis and Sludge enter. He frowns at the two and directs a 
comment at them, while speaking to the rest of the Autobots, "The 
key to our succes lies in our ability to follow orders, and our 
compassion for all. So, if we follow orders, and arrive at meetings 
without delay, then we have begun with a good start. Now for 
orders. Artemis and JetV, I want you two to scout out our current 
location and report back to me. Hoist, I need you to get the ship's 
computers functioning fully. We need to know the status of the 
ship as soon as possible. Technobots, I want you to start planning 
a defensive perimetre to deter any enemy bots, or scouts. 
Dinobots, your task is to guard the Technobots, and the ship. I 
don't want any intruders to get in and cause any further damage to 
our already damaged ship. Everyone else, asses the damages and 
report back to me when you've made a detailed report. Oh, Crotale 
you're with me, and you are the second in command. Also, 
Grimlock, you are in charge of battle planning and our militia 
forces. Crossroads will be accompanying you around, and he will 
be your strategic advisor."

Crossroads gulps at this and glances at the frightning dinosaur 
towering above him, but he trusts in Pacifix's judgement.

Pacifix notices Grimlock's visage but ignores it, then he catches 
the eye of Strafe and speaks to him, "Strafe, you look like you've 
got something to say?" He waits attentively.


On 17 Jul 2001, at 21:29, robertdahl wrote:

> OOC: Excellent Jeff
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Grimlock snarled and folded his arms, turning himself away. This was
> pathetic, and a waste of time, espeacially on rookies.
> 
> Hoist, however, was filled with vigor from the speech, "We'll kick
> their afterburners back to Cybertron." he said with Jubulation.
> 
> Strafe simply nodded, he was going to wait for an opening to tell them
> about the situation outside.
